Instruction: Combine flour, eggs, milk, and salt to create a dough. Knead the dough on a floured surface, then roll it out and cut it into squares.
Cook the dumplings in a large pot of boiling salted water for 8 to 10 minutes, until they rise to the surface. Use a slotted spoon to transfer the cooked dumplings to a bowl.
